item.title: THE HOBBIT Start of Production - Peter Jackson
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

Davidi2:

Is it really? Wow…

Yeah, I took it to a pawn shop, the guy offered $100 to me cause it was selling that much on amazon/ebay and he thought the same thing as me.
Looks like it’s dropped a little in price online but whatever, it’ll go up.

Read full topic

item.title: THE HOBBIT Start of Production - Peter Jackson
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Holic, post:6, topic:390873”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=486820.msg3571848#msg3571848 date=1303101368]

[quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=486820.msg3571753#msg3571753 date=1303093732]
It’s about time considering no one I know managed to sit through the animated one which, in my opinion, gave the book a bad name.
[/quote]I agree, we have the animated one, and it sucks… in no uncertain terms
[/quote]Worth $100 currently.[/quote]Is it really? Wow…

Read full topic

item.title: THE HOBBIT Start of Production - Peter Jackson
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:390873”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=486820.msg3571753#msg3571753 date=1303093732]
It’s about time considering no one I know managed to sit through the animated one which, in my opinion, gave the book a bad name.
[/quote]I agree, we have the animated one, and it sucks… in no uncertain terms[/quote]
i have the original animated one on vhs, unopened. figure i hold onto it until hobbit is released and sell it then.
bought it at one of book sales the boys & girls clubs are always putting on for $1. Worth $100 currently.

Read full topic
